EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Please Update SunPower Alliance Leads Today! - {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
I called earlier and left you a voicemail to contact and update the following SunPower Alliance lead(s) that was assigned to (Dealer A) last (mm/dd/yyyy) in the SunPower Partner Portal.
(Paste lead list here…)
To update your lead(s) immediately, please follow these 3 easy steps:
1. Log on to the SunPower Partner Portal
2. Go to Opportunities tab and select SunPower Leads from the dropdown.
3. Open the lead that needs to be updated and change the Opportunity Stage to ‘Contacted’. Save your changes.
If you have any questions, please call 1-877-779-7496 or email us at allianceprogram@sunpowercorp.com.
Regards,
(SME)
SunPower Alliance Team
www.sunpowercorp.com
1-877-779-7496
